SEARCH
Package com.example.frontend

Class RmiClientService

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
com.example.frontend.RmiClientService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, IStatistics
@Service public class RmiClientService extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IStatistics

Service class responsible for connecting to the Gateway RMI server and receiving real-time system statistics updates. The class implements the IStatistics interface to handle statistics updates.

This service connects to a Gateway RMI server specified by the configuration file and registers for receiving updates on system statistics. It then uses WebSocket to send these updates to subscribed clients.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      @PostConstruct public void connect()

      Initializes the connection to the RMI Gateway server upon bean initialization.

      This method loads configuration settings, attempts to connect to the RMI registry, and registers this client to receive real-time statistics updates.

    • updateStatistics

      public void updateStatistics(SystemStatistics stats) throws RemoteException

      Receives system statistics updates from the Gateway and sends them to subscribed clients via WebSocket.

      Specified by:
      updateStatistics in interface IStatistics
      Parameters:
      stats - the updated system statistics.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a communication issue during the update.
